How do i choose what to download in Vuze?

OK, this does NOT work. It may contain language files but there is NO WAY OF CHANGING THE GAME LANGUAGE.

Closest thing to select language is in DishonoredGameConfigDefaultEngine.ini

There's this line: 
Language=int

I changed it to Language=esn and it does not work. I also changed it in My DocumentsMy gamesDishonored files, and it doesn't change a thing either.

@Mice07

Thank you, none of the cracks I downloaded (Skidrow, FLT, 3DM) have that steam.ini file. Guess I'll have to try the Reloaded one!
How do i choose just one?
Pls Seed // German Language Stucks now -.-
Consegui resolver  o problema. Troquei o idioma de "English" para "Spanish", no arquivo "steam_rld_original.ini", que esta na pasta  "DishonoredBinariesWin32".

Language = "german"

in

SKIDROW.ini

and it works!

Language = "german"

in SKIDROW.ini

and it works!
